definition[0]: the state of being able to be used, bought, or found
example[0]: Rooms are offered subject to availability  (=only if they are available).
definition[1]: the state of being able to do something because you have enough time
example[2]: He has been asked about his availability to take part in the competition.
definition[2]: the fact that something is able to be used or can easily be bought or found
definition[3]: a phrase meaning that it is possible to buy or choose something if it is still available
example[3]: The weekend breaks can be taken any weekend, subject to availability.
